name: A+ Positivo
description:
We are a young agency, but with great trajectory.
Creativity with results. We are an agency that was born in 2013, but with professionals with more than 20 years of experience. We have a wide portfolio of clients in different areas, with national reach. We have hypermarkets, we have radios, we have credit card, we have hotels, we have real estate, we have TV channels, we have internet providers, we have casinos. We have creativity.
